slides.titre: Modernize hospital management for a more
slides.sous_titre: A comprehensive HIS platform designed to strengthen care quality, ensure continuity of medical services, and sustainably structure clinical data for the benefit of populations.

slides.titre: Turn your hospital data into strategic decisions for a
slides.sous_titre: Centralize clinical, financial, and logistical data to improve transparency, budget efficiency, and real-time public health indicator monitoring.

slides.titre: Deploy an HIS compliant with international standards for
slides.sous_titre: Modular architecture compatible with HL7 FHIR and DICOM, ensuring secure medical data exchange and integration with national health surveillance systems.

probleme.titre: Healthcare facilities in Africa face critical challenges
probleme.sous_titre: Most hospitals still operate with fragmented processes that compromise care quality and governance.

points.description: Paper records, isolated spreadsheets, disconnected software: patient information is scattered across departments with no unified view.
Billing, inventory management, and scheduling rely on repetitive manual entries, leading to errors and financial losses.
Without audit trails or logging, facilities struggle to ensure regulatory compliance and medical data security.

solution.titre: An integrated platform for the entire hospital workflow
solution.description: Medkey centralizes all clinical, administrative, and financial workflows in a single system. From electronic medical records to billing, from pharmacy to laboratory, every module communicates natively with the others.
points: Unified patient record accessible to all departments
Financial flows tracked from admission to discharge

modules.titre: 14 modules to cover all hospital needs
modules.sous_titre: Each module can be deployed independently and integrates natively with the other platform components.

adt.description: Complete patient journey management: from registration to discharge, bed tracking and inter-department movements.

dme.description: Centralization of medical history, observations, prescriptions, and results in a single structured patient record.

cpoe.description: Electronic prescription entry with drug interaction alerts and therapeutic protocols.

pharmacie.description: Inventory tracking, nominative dispensing, batch traceability, and supply management.

lis.description: Complete analysis workflow: requests, sampling, results, biological validation, and patient history.

ris_pacs.description: Imaging exam scheduling, DICOM-standard archiving and image viewing.

facturation.description: Automated procedure pricing, third-party payer management, outstanding payment tracking, and financial reporting.

planification.description: Medical schedule management, appointment booking, and resource utilization optimization.

rh.description: Healthcare and administrative staff management: schedules, skills, training, and evaluations.

maintenance.description: Equipment fleet tracking, preventive maintenance scheduling, and intervention management.

supply_chain.description: Procurement management, consumable and medication inventory tracking, threshold alerts, and ordering.

bi.description: Decision-making dashboards, clinical and financial performance indicators, automated reports.

portail_patient.description: Secure patient access to their record, online appointment booking, and video consultations.

interop.description: Standardized data exchange with third-party systems, national platforms, and connected devices.

interoperabilite.sous_titre: Medkey adheres to digital health reference standards to ensure seamless medical data exchange.

standards.description: Structured clinical data exchange with any FHIR R4 compatible system.
Native integration with imaging equipment and PACS servers.
Connect your existing tools via a documented and secured API (OAuth2).
Connectors adapted to epidemiological surveillance and health reporting platforms.

securite.titre: Medical data security at the core of the architecture
securite.sous_titre: Every layer of the platform is designed to protect sensitive patient data and ensure regulatory compliance.

garanties.description: Data encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3).
Every access and modification is logged with timestamp and user identity.
Granular permissions by department, function, and data sensitivity level.
On-premise or regional cloud deployment compliant with local data protection regulations.

bi_reporting.titre: From raw data to strategic decisions
bi_reporting.sous_titre: Turn your facility's daily activity into actionable indicators for management and oversight authorities.

indicateurs.description: Real-time tracking by department, activity peak anticipation.
Analysis by pathology and department to optimize patient pathways.
Collection rate, cost per stay, margin per activity.
Automated reports compliant with WHO and ministerial requirements.

temoignages.titre: They deployed Medkey in their facilities

liste.citation: Medkey helped us reduce admission processing time by 40% and finally gain a consolidated view of hospital activity.
Integrating the laboratory with the patient record transformed our care workflow. Results are now available in real time for clinicians.
The billing module made our financial flows transparent. We improved our collection rate by 25% in six months.

cta_final.titre: Build a lasting hospital information system
cta_final.sous_titre: Join the facilities that chose Medkey to centralize their data, streamline their processes, and improve care quality.
